Html:
I am needing assistance in just getting the site up and running


Have Visual Studio 2005 standard and cute ftp

Have the standard clubsite for VS version 3 beta 1

There are four folders... what do I need to put up on the server to view the site?

I have already put up the sql DB
Use the publish feature on VS 2005... it should work better for you. It does all the FTP work for you along with precompilation (which will save your website's performance).

I tried using the publish via ftp and the build started and failed with this error on the Page.aspx.vb:


Error 102 'Section' is not a member of 'System.Web.UI.UserControl'. C:\Documents and Settings\Hello18\Desktop\ClubStarterKit.Web\ContentPages\Page.aspx.vb 9




Partial Class ContentPages_Page
Inherits System.Web.UI.Page

Protected Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load
If CStr(Request("page")) Is Nothing Then
Response.Redirect("~/default.aspx")
Else
WebContent1.Section = CStr(Request("page"))
End If
End Sub
End Class



Any ideas?
